content.text:
# 32nd TNN/Music City News Country Awards

The 32nd TNN/Music City News Country Awards was held on June 15, 1998, at the Grand Ole Opry House, in Nashville, Tennessee . The ceremony was hosted by Jeff Foxworthy.
Winners and nominees
Winners are shown in bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| style="vertical-align:top" |
* Neal McCoy
** Garth Brooks
** Billy Ray Cyrus
** Alan Jackson
** George Strait
| style="vertical-align:top" |
* 'The Best of Billy Ray Cyrus: Cover to Cover — Billy Ray Cyrus'
** Carrying Your Love with Me — George Strait
** Everything I Love — Alan Jackson
** Making Plans — Ricky Van Shelton
** You Light Up My Life: Inspirational Songs — LeAnn Rimes
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Male Artist of the Year
|-

** Martina McBride

** Trisha Yearwood
| style="vertical-align:top" |

** Vince Gill

** George Strait

** "Between the Devil and Me" — Alan Jackson

** "Carrying Your Love with Me" — Jeff Stevens and Steve Bogard
** "How Do I Live" —'' Diane Warren
** "It's Your Love" — Stephony Smith
** "There Goes" — Alan Jackson
